remarks: An ordinal is weakly inaccessible iff it is a regular limit cardinal. Note that our definition allows ` _om ` as a weakly inaccessible cardinal.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2013.)
statement:
df-wina $p |- InaccW = { x | ( x =/= (/) /\ ( cf ` x ) = x /\ A. y e. x E. z e. x y ~< z ) } $.
$d x y z $.
